There are a number of things it could be, but I'm always suspicious of filenames with spaces in them - especially since this an HTML environment, and it tends to want to turn spaces into "%20", etc.

So I would try renaming the file without spaces. Make it short and sweet and spaceless as a test, and see if that helps.
